conditional_rules: IF resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'list' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'list' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'deleteContacts'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactSample'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'contact' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'upsert' AND resource == 'contact' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'delete' AND deleteAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'ids'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'deleteAll'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'contact' THEN SHOW parameter 'by'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'contact' AND by == 'id' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'contact' AND by == 'email' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'mail' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'mail' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'fromEmail'
IF resource == 'mail' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'fromName'
IF resource == 'mail' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'toEmail'
IF resource == 'mail' AND operation == 'send' AND dynamicTemplate == False THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF resource == 'mail' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'dynamicTemplate'
IF resource == 'mail' AND operation == 'send' AND dynamicTemplate == False THEN SHOW parameter 'contentType'
IF resource == 'mail' AND operation == 'send' AND dynamicTemplate == False THEN SHOW parameter 'contentValue'
IF resource == 'mail' AND operation == 'send' AND dynamicTemplate == True THEN SHOW parameter 'templateId'
IF resource == 'mail' AND operation == 'send' AND dynamicTemplate == True THEN SHOW parameter 'dynamicTemplateFields'
IF resource == 'mail' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
